title: Successful user login with correct credentials
description: Verify that a user can log in successfully using valid username/email and password through Supabase Auth.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Click on the login button
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard

title: Prevent login with invalid credentials
description: Verify that login fails when incorrect username/email or password is provided and appropriate error message appears.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Click on the login button
Verify that login is rejected and an error message is displayed

title: Session management maintains user login state
description: Verify the session remains active during user inactivity and user is logged out or session expired after timeout.

steps.description: Log in with valid credentials
Remain idle for a time less than session timeout
Verify the session is still active and user can continue interacting
Remain idle beyond session timeout period
Verify the session is expired and user is logged out or prompted to log in again

title: Unauthorized access to protected pages is blocked
description: Verify that unauthorized users cannot access pages or modules without sufficient permissions and are redirected appropriately.

steps.description: Log in as a user without permissions for a specific module/page
Attempt to navigate directly to the unauthorized page URL
Verify access is denied and user is redirected to an error page or dashboard

title: Dashboard loads correctly and displays statistics
description: Verify that the dashboard page loads fully with all statistics, trend graphs, drill-down analyses and critical alerts rendered correctly.

steps.description: Log in successfully
Navigate to the dashboard page
Verify dashboard statistics are displayed with correct data
Verify trend graphs render with data
Verify drill-down analysis features respond on interaction
Verify critical alerts are displayed if applicable

title: Create a nonconformity record successfully in DF/8D module
description: Verify that users can create new nonconformity records with valid data, including use of analysis templates and progression through 8D steps.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to DF/8D Management module
Start creating a new nonconformity record
Fill all required fields with valid data
Use available analysis templates to complete the record
Progress through the 8D problem solving steps
Verify record is saved and visible in the list with all data correctly stored

title: Verify supplier list and details loading in Supplier Quality module
description: Ensure supplier list loads with all entries and users can view detailed supplier information including calculated PPM/OTD metrics.

steps.description: Navigate to Supplier Quality module
Verify that the supplier list is loaded and displayed
Select a supplier from the list
Verify the supplier detail page loads showing supplier info and calculated PPM and OTD values

title: Customer complaint creation and SLA tracking
description: Verify users can create new customer complaints, SLA deadlines are set and tracked properly, and users can create action plans linked to complaints.

steps.description: Navigate to Customer Complaints module
Create a new complaint with valid data
Verify complaint is saved successfully
Verify SLA tracking status and deadlines are displayed for newly created complaint
Create action plans linked to this complaint
Verify action plans are saved and linked correctly

title: Internal audit creation and observation recording
description: Verify users can create audit plans, record findings for audits, and utilize the question bank effectively during inspections.

steps.description: Navigate to Internal Audit module
Create a new audit plan
During audit, record findings and observations
Use questions from the question bank in audit checklist
Verify audit plan, findings, and questions are saved and displayed correctly

title: Quality cost records creation and COPQ analysis visualization
description: Verify users can create quality cost records, these records are stored, and COPQ analysis reports are generated and displayed properly.

steps.description: Navigate to Quality Cost Management module
Create new cost records with valid data
Verify cost records are saved and visible
Generate COPQ analysis report
Verify COPQ analysis data and visualization is displayed correctly

title: Navigation across different modules functions correctly
description: Verify users can navigate between all listed modules seamlessly and the UI updates accordingly without errors.

steps.description: Log in to the system
Navigate sequentially through each module (DF/8D, Supplier Quality, Customer Complaints, Internal Audit, Quality Cost, Other Modules)
Verify that each module page loads correctly with its contents

title: CRUD operations on standard forms in other modules
description: Verify Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations work correctly on forms in modules such as Quarantine, Deviation, Equipment, Document, KPI, Kaizen, Task, Training, Polyvalence, Benchmark, Process Control, Incoming Quality, Produced Vehicles, WPS, Audit Log, Cost Settings.

steps.description: Navigate to a given module (e.g., Equipment)
Create a new record with valid inputs
Verify new record is saved and displayed in list
Edit existing record with new data
Verify record updates are saved and reflected
Delete the record
Verify record is removed from the system

title: Form validation enforces required fields and input formats
description: Verify that forms across the system correctly validate required fields, input types, and show error messages for invalid or missing data.

steps.description: Navigate to a form page in any module
Attempt to submit the form with empty required fields
Verify that appropriate error messages are displayed and form is not submitted
Fill fields with invalid formats (e.g. invalid dates, numbers, emails)
Verify validation errors are shown for invalid inputs

title: Modal and dialog UI components open, function and close correctly
description: Verify that modal dialogs used in CRUD forms or warnings open on trigger, accept user input, and close properly.

steps.description: Trigger opening of a modal in any module
Verify modal content renders correctly
Interact with form elements inside modal
Close modal using cancel or close icon
Verify modal is closed and underlying page returns to normal

title: Generate and download PDF reports successfully
description: Verify that reports can be generated in PDF format from the system and the PDF file downloads with correct content.

steps.description: Navigate to a report generation page (e.g., DF/8D summary, COPQ analysis)
Trigger report generation with valid filters
Click the download or export PDF button
Verify that PDF file is downloaded and contains the expected report data

title: Responsive design adapts UI correctly on different screen sizes
description: Verify UI components and layouts adapt properly on different viewport sizes from desktop to mobile resolutions.

steps.description: Open the Kademe QMS application on desktop viewport
Verify the layout is correct and no elements are broken or overlapping
Resize window or emulate tablet/mobile screen sizes
Verify the UI adapts properly with navigational menus, content, and buttons visible and usable

title: Backend API endpoints respond correctly to valid and invalid requests
description: Test key API endpoints with valid inputs return correct data, and invalid inputs cause proper error responses with informative messages.

steps.description: Send valid request to authentication/login API
Verify API returns success with user session data
Send invalid or malformed request to same API
Verify API returns error response with details
Send valid requests to CRUD APIs for DF/8D or Supplier Quality with valid payloads
Verify data is created, updated, or deleted appropriately
Send unauthorized requests without valid auth token
Verify API rejects requests with authentication errors

title: Database operations enforce Row Level Security (RLS) policies correctly
description: Verify backend database enforces RLS policies so users can only access data according to their permissions.

steps.description: Log in as a user with limited permissions
Attempt to query data outside user's permission scope via API or DB
Verify that data outside scope is not accessible
Access data within allowed scope
Verify data is accessible as expected

title: RPC functions respond accurately to various scenarios
description: Test remote procedure calls for calculations such as PPM/OTD, report aggregations, and verify outputs are correct based on input data.

steps.description: Call RPC function for PPM calculation with valid data
Verify correct calculation value and response
Call RPC function with edge case or missing data
Verify RPC handles gracefully or returns understandable error

title: Storage operations manage uploads and downloads successfully
description: Verify file storage functionality including uploading documents, images or reports and successfully retrieving or downloading them.

steps.description: Navigate to a module that allows document upload (e.g., Document module)
Upload valid file(s)
Verify upload is successful and file is listed
Download previously uploaded file
Verify file downloads correctly and is not corrupted

title: Backend error handling returns proper messages and does not crash system
description: Verify that backend gracefully handles unexpected errors in APIs or database without crashing, and provides meaningful error messages to the frontend.

steps.description: Trigger backend error scenarios like invalid parameters, database constraint violation
Verify API returns proper error responses with HTTP status codes and error message body
Verify frontend handles error response gracefully without crashing

title: User scenario: Full flow from login to dashboard and module record creation
description: Simulate a typical user journey starting from login, navigating dashboard, accessing a module, creating a record, and logging out to validate end-to-end integration.

steps.description: Log in with valid user credentials
Verify redirection to dashboard with statistics and graphs
Navigate to DF/8D Management module
Create a new nonconformity record
Verify record creation success message and visibility in list
Log out from the system
Verify user is redirected to login page and session invalidated
